# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $140. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. We're confident it will meet your expectations and provide significant value. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
